message.content:
I need to identify the line item in the cash flow statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there is a line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45748.43 on 2024-01-27.

Depreciation is the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, so this is exactly what I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45748.43'}}
```
